Title: I Only Miss Her When I'm Breathing
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), John Wells, Dominique Morisseau (story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Frank is struggling with the loss of a loved one. Fiona gets a promotion at the diner. Mickey is handling business behind bars. Debbie is making a decision with her pregnancy.
